meanings.definition: An art exhibition that occurs every two years.
meanings.sent1: The biennale showcased paintings and sculptures from around the world.
meanings.sent2: I'm looking forward to attending the biennale next year to see all the new artworks.
meanings.sent3: At the biennale, the artists decided to have a paint-off competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed at the biennale like a garden in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The biennale was a vibrant tapestry of artistic expression.

meanings.definition: A festival or event that takes place every two years.
meanings.sent1: The biennale in town always attracts a large crowd with its music and food.
meanings.sent2: The biennale is a great opportunity for the community to come together and celebrate.
meanings.sent3: The biennale featured a unique mix of traditional and modern performances.
meanings.sent4: The biennale was a beacon of joy in the town's calendar, shining every two years.
meanings.sent5: The biennale brought a wave of excitement and festivity to the town.
